name: Raccoon Brothers
description:
A classic game series preserved from the blocksworld archives, now on itch.io.

Taking place in the fictional town of Okorlock, Remy, a sort of 16-year old space raccoon who is starting to find himself, lives with his mom, Angie(She is Remy’s mom who is the same “species” as Remy, and is a little bit of a rocky relationship with Alfred),Alfred(a skeleton alien creature who is Remy’s dad. He is a bit of a slacker, but is at least able to do stuff when needed), Horace(A robot created by Dad who acts as Remy’s brother, and is usually the voice of reason in the house when Remy gets into a problem), Walter(Remy’s best pal who occasionally hangs out with Remy, but a lot of times to gain something he wishes for himself), and Bert(An animatronic Everyman who Remy gets along with).
